# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. Mission is pleased that Dr. Hoofnagle will be able to make an administrative visit to La Paz with the OINM Bolivia Desk Officer for approximately one week beginning on/about April 16. Please confirm exact dates, flights, etc. when this information is available.
2. For the record, Mission would also appreciate receiving a telegram from USDA confirming its approval for PASA Project Manager Howard L. Steele to take early home leave beginning on/about May 24 as per discussion during Beal/Hoofnagle telecon March 9.
Boeker
